certifications.title: Cyber Security and Its ten domains

projects.name: MALWARE CLASSIFICATION USING ML ALGORITHMS
projects.description: Achieved 91.27 percent accuracy in malware classification using Python and CNN. Used an open-set image dataset with 25 malware classes and legitimate software for precise recognition. Utilized Python, Logistic Regression, Convolutional Neural Network, and Random Forest for effective and efficient malware classification.

projects.name: HOUSE PRICE PREDICTION
projects.description: Created a real estate price predictor using Python, Sklearn, and Flask, integrating data cleaning, feature engineering, and a Flask-based interface. Designed a user-friendly real estate price prediction website with Python Flask, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and prioritized Linear Regression for 95% accuracy.

projects.name: DIGIT RECOGNITION SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed a Digit Recognition System using CNN, achieving 94% accuracy. Applied data mining for preprocessing, transformation, and feature engineering with Python. Delivered an accurate digit recognition model using TensorFlow, Keras, and Scikit-Learn. Utilized Python libraries for data preprocessing and modeling.

experiences.description: Researched and developed NLP techniques, focusing on information extraction and achieving 88% accuracy in NER using spaCy. Developed a chatbot using RAG with LangChain and open-source LLMs, alongside a Streamlit interface for enhanced user interaction.

Learned about Artificial Intelligence, Python, and Machine Learning through IBM-certified course modules. Led a team of 2 to develop a Mental Health Fitness Tracker, comparing accuracy from different regression models.

full_output.name: Rahul Latotra
publications: ADAPTIVE COLORIZATION OF HISTORICAL AND FADED PHOTOGRAPHS | DEHRADUN, INDIA 09/2023 - 05/2024 Analyzed efficiency in colorizing historical and grayscale photos using cGAN, ResNet18, and U-Net models. Published in IEEE Digital Xplore after presentation at ICC - ROBINS 2024.
